title: BRIEF-Quotium Technologies H1 consolidated net result turns to profit of 1.0 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-Quotium Technologies H1 consolidated net result turns to profit of 1.0 mln euros Sept 22 
Sept 22 Quotium Technologies SA : 
* Reports H1 consolidated net profit of 1.0 million euros ($1.11 million) versus loss of 0.4 million euros a year ago 
* H1 operating income is 347,000 euros versus loss of 354,000 euros a year ago Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8993 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
